Mahfud Imbau Waspadai Propaganda Menuju HUT OPM
05 Nov 2019, 22:58 by Denisa Tristianty


Mahfud Imbau Waspadai Propaganda Menuju HUT OPM

Jakarta, KBRN : Menteri Koordinator bidang Politik, Hukum dan Keamanan (Menko Polhukam), Mahfud MD mengimbau semua pihak perlu waspada menuju hari ulang tahun (HUT) Organisasi Papua Merdeka (OPM), pada Minggu 1 Desember 2019. Khususnya, Mahfud mengatakan waspada kemungkinan muncul propaganda politik.
"Hal itu menjadi perhatian bagi kita agar Papua berhati-hati secara politis, karena dari segi keamanannya sudah standar," kata Mahfud, di Kantor Kemenko Polhukam, Jakarta Pusat, seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, Selasa (5/11/2019).Secara politis, lanjut dia, adalah kadang-kadang dibangun opini opini yang tidak-tidak. Dia memastikan pemerintah pusat siap menangani segala kemungkinan itu."Padahal pada kenyataannya di lapangan tak benar, semua sudah kami antisipasi. Aparat keamanan sudah menyiapkan strategi jika terjadi sesuatu yang tidak diinginkan pada peringatan HUT OPM," terang dia.Dia menekankan, pendekatan keamanan bakal dilakukan aparat sesuai standard operation procedure (SOP). "Semua sudah ada SOP-nya. Kalau ada pelanggaran SOP akan ditindak. Termasuk, jika dilakukan oleh internal aparat," katanya. (ANTARA FOTO/Muhammad Adimaja/ama)

Mahfud Imbau Beware of Propaganda Towards OPM Anniversary
05 Nov 2019, 22:58 by Denisa Tristianty


Mahfud Imbau Beware of Propaganda Towards OPM Anniversary

Jakarta, KBRN: Coordinating Minister for Politics, Law and Security (Menko Polhukam), Mahfud MD urged all parties to be vigilant towards the anniversary of the Free Papua Organization (OPM), on Sunday 1 December 2019. In particular, Mahfud said he was wary of the possibility of political propaganda emerged.
"This is a concern for us so that Papua is politically careful, because in terms of security it is standard," said Mahfud, at the Office of the Coordinating Ministry for Politics and Security, Central Jakarta, as reported by the Antara News Agency, Tuesday (11/05/2019). Politically, he continued, opinion is sometimes built which is a no-no opinion. He made sure the central government was ready to handle all the possibilities. "In fact, in reality, it was not true, we had anticipated everything. The security forces had prepared a strategy if something unexpected happened to the OPM Anniversary warning," he explained. He stressed, the security approach would be carried out apparatus according to standard operation procedure (SOP). "All of the SOPs are already in place. If there are violations of the SOP, they will be prosecuted. Including, if carried out by internal officials," he said. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Muhammad Adimaja / ama)
